problem.markdown:
1. Which is incorrect?
() All the above () In charpy test, specimen supported horizontally in simply supported manner. () Striking energy for Izod is 164J (x) In charpy test notch is U shaped and is placed so that it lies on compression side
2. In charpy impact test KU 300/5; where 300/5 indicates
() Both a and b are correct () Both a and b are incorrect () Test was conducted with 300 Newton force with 5 mm deep notch (x) Test was conducted with 300 Joules striking energy with 5 mm deep notch
3. What is the distance between the supports in charpy test?
() 10 mm () 20 mm () 30 mm (x) 40 mm
4. The speed of the hammer at the instant of striking shall be
() 9.8 - 10 m/sec () 6.2 - 9 m/sec () 2 - 4.8 m/sec (x) 4.5 - 7 m/sec
5. The initial energy of the hammer is
() 164 Joules () 290 Joules (x) 300 joules () 200 Joules

choicegroup.choice: In charpy test, specimen supported horizontally in simply supported manner.
In charpy test notch is U shaped and is placed so that it lies on compression side

problem.p: 2. In charpy impact test KU 300/5; where 300/5 indicates

choicegroup.choice: Both a and b are correct
Both a and b are incorrect
Test was conducted with 300 Newton force with 5 mm deep notch
Test was conducted with 300 Joules striking energy with 5 mm deep notch
